subSubSection.paragraph:
Description of the type series.
SHELL yELLOwIsH IvOry; sHELL OUTLINE OvaL frOm dOrsaL vIEw, sHELL aLmOsT fLaT, EdGE Of bOdy wHOrL Is rOUNdEd; prOTOCONCH LOw, CONsIsTING Of 1.5 wHOrLs, raTHEr maTTE; R1 CONsIsTs Of 1.5 Or sLIGHTLy mOrE wHOrLs, rEGULarLy, dENsELy rIbbEd; TraNsITION bETwEEN R1 aNd R2 HardLy vIsIbLE; R2 sLIGHTLy mOrE dENsELy rIbbEd THaN R1; CrOss-sECTIONaL vIEw Of R2 COULd NOT bE ExamINEd, bUT prObabLy sImILar TO THOsE Of THE OTHEr spECIEs HavING CUrvEd rIbs; LENGTH Of R2 aNd R3 sLIGHTLy mOrE THaN a qUarTEr wHOrL COmbINEd; R2 aNd R3 Of abOUT THE samE LENGTH; TraNsITION bETwEEN R2 aNd R3 CLEarLy vIsIbLE, INdICaTEd by sLIGHT CONsTrICTION; R3 wITH raTHEr IrrEGULar GrOwTH rIbs, rIb dENsITy sImILar TO THaT Of R1; apErTUrE rOUNdEd; OUTEr LIp sLIGHTLy rEfLECTEd, sHarp; INNEr LIp THICkENEd.
Measurements (in mm). D = 2.8–3.3, H = 1.6–1.9 (N = 5, spECImENs frOm dIffErENT sampLEs).

Operculum. THE INNEr sUrfaCE COULd NOT bE ExamINEd, THE OUTEr sUrfaCE Is NEarLy smOOTH, bUT THE mULTIspIraL CHaraCTEr Is rECOGNIsabLE (ExamINEd: sampLE 20060109A, LECTOTypE Of
nanus
, syNTypE Of
diminutus
).
Variation in specimens. THE spECImENs LIsTEd UNdEr THIs spECIEs sHOw LITTLE varIabILITy, aLTHOUGH THEy HavE bEEN COLLECTEd far frOm EaCH OTHEr. SEE aLsO rEmarks.

Differential diagnosis. THE ONLy NEwLy COLLECTEd sampLEs wE ExamINEd wErE COLLECTEd IN sOUTHEasT YUNNaN , wHErE IT Is sympaTrIC wITH a
D. cristatus
pOpULaTION (TypICaL
simplicilabris
-LIkE sHELLs). THE TwO spECIEs arE sImILar IN OvEraLL sHELL sHapE aNd THE prOpOrTIONs Of THE sHELL rEGIONs, bUT
D. cristatus Is
mUCH LarGEr, aNd Has a sLIGHTLy CrENULaTEd pErIsTOmE. SEE aLsO UNdEr
Dicharax depressus
aNd
D. fargesianus
aNd
D. plicilabris
.
Distribution. CHINa ( CHONGqING , HUNaN aNd YUNNaN prOvINCEs). SEE aLsO REmarks aNd FIGUrE 14 .
